name: For A Reason
description:
Everything happens....

For A Reason is a sapphic visual novel set in a witch's academy setting. It's centered around two main characters, Jane and Lora, and the relationship between people around them. Talk to your crush, solve mysteries, and avoid the assaulter that's trying to attack everyone in school!

The demo version of this visual novel is submitted for Devtober 2022. This demo includes:

  • 1.7k words
  • Original character sprites
  • A sneak peek on the two possible routes
  • Girls crushing on girls

Credits:

  • Backgrounds by Noraneko Games
  • Music by incompetech
  • SFX by freesound
  • VCR OSD Mono font by Riciery Leal
